results.description:
In this Unit, Learners will learn about various Committees and Commissions setup Post Independence, their Reports and Recommendations. Learn about Relationship between Policies and Education and Politics and Education and their Impact on each other. What is the concept Economics of Education and much more.

Details of every concept will be covered along with doubt clarification and topic-wise PYQs practice.
results.name: Complete Course on History, Politics and Economics of Education
